ConfigurationOption.Value: select it.itemnum, it.description, it.itemtype, iv.location, iv.binnum, iv.issueunit, iv.orderunit, iv.catalogcode, iv.category, iv.manufacturer, iv.modelnum, iv.vendor, iv.ccf, iv.abctype, iv.minlevel, iv.maxlevel, it.lottype, it.rotating, it.conditionenabled, it.itemsetid, iv.siteid, iv.orgid, it.classstructureid, iv.inventoryid, it.itemid from inventory iv join item it on it.itemnum = iv.itemnum and it.itemsetid = iv.itemsetid
